    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    ValueWithAttributes PaymentCardType_Issuer

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:StringShort
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:PaymentCardType_Issuer

      • Description

        Code of the payment card issuer.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers Extension: List_PaymentCardIssuer

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PaymentCardType_Issuer issuerCode="VISA" issuerCodeExtension="issuerCode_Other_Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">786</PaymentCardType_Issuer>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PaymentCardType_Issuer" : {
    "value" : "786",
    "issuerCode" : "VISA",
    "issuerCodeExtension" : "issuerCode_Other_Value"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        issuerCode
        Code Extension fields to exchange a value that is not in the list and is known to your trading partners.
        Details
        Type PaymentCardIssuer_Enum
        Example Value VISA
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
